author: depasse
body:
Use of  https://github.com/cms-data/CalibCalorimetry-EcalTrivialCondModules  replacing CalibCalorimetry/EcalTrivialCondModules/data in CMSSW

#### PR description:

PR #26522  mixed with #5 for data suppressed from CMSSW did not work for PFRecHitsThrezsholds (path problem) : solved

#### PR validation:

Tests with CondTools/Ecal/python/  cmsRun copyEcalPFRecHitThresholdsFromFile_cfg.py.py file : OK now.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:
title: ECAL : Use of Extra Package in cms-data
